snippet: House Republicans passed two measures that discriminate against gay soldiers. The Senate needs to strip the offensive amendments from the final bill.
abstract: Editorial criticizes House Republicans for passing two amendments to a military spending bill that discriminate against gay soldiers; urges the Senate to strip the amendments from the bill.
lead_paragraph: House Republicans passed two measures that discriminate against gay soldiers. The Senate needs to strip the offensive amendments from the final bill.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
